item.title: Mobikwik IPO Allotment Live Updates: Check GMP price, Listing date, and other key details - The Financial Express
item.description:
Mobikwik IPO Allotment Live Updates: Check GMP price, Listing date, and other key details

Published: December 16, 2024 14:29 IST | Source: Financial Express

The Mobikwik IPO, priced between Rs 265 and 279, is set for a final allotment today, December 16, with the listing on December 18. This IPO is part of a fresh issue valued at Rs 572 crore, consisting of 2.05 crore equity shares.

  • The IPO opened for bidding from December 11 to December 13.
  • The lead managers include SBI Capital Markets and Dam Capital Advisors.
  • Mobikwik shares are currently trading at a grey market premium of Rs 165, indicating strong investor interest.
  • The IPO was subscribed 119.38 times on the final day of bidding.
“Mobikwik’s addressable market in FY23 is approximately USD 5.3 billion, projected to grow significantly by FY28,” stated Geojit.

Overall, the Mobikwik IPO is generating significant interest, and industry observers are keenly awaiting its listing.

item.title: Stock Market Live: Nifty, Sensex Decline As TCS, Infosys Share Prices Drag - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Stock Market Live: Nifty, Sensex Decline As TCS, Infosys Share Prices Drag

Date: 16 Dec 2024, Source: NDTV Profit

Today, the Indian stock markets saw a decline with major IT stocks such as TCS and Infosys dragging down the Nifty and Sensex indices. Additional pressure was observed from fluctuating share prices in the banking and financial sectors.

  • Nifty and Sensex decline due to falling prices in TCS and Infosys.
  • Bajaj Finance and Power Grid Corp shares show some recovery, preventing further dips.
  • Concerns surrounding European stocks affect market sentiment.
  • India VIX increased over 11%, indicating heightened market volatility.
  • India Pesticides undergoes an IT search while cooperating fully with authorities.
“The Nifty 50 and Sensex were trading off day's low as Bajaj Finance Ltd. and Power Grid Corp of India share prices rose.”

The market context reflects a complex relationship between technology stock performance and overall market health, suggesting investors remain cautious amidst rising volatility.

item.title: Reliance Industries shares set to close the year with negative returns for the first time in 10 years - The Financial Express
item.description:
Reliance Industries shares set to close the year with negative returns for the first time in 10 years

Publication Date: December 16, 2024

Source: Financial Express

Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Industries (RIL) is set to conclude 2024 with negative stock returns, marking the first such occurrence in ten years as its stock has faced challenges across various business verticals.

  • Reliance's stock has underperformed, tumbling 15% over the past three months.
  • The company's market cap currently stands at Rs 17.22 lakh crore.
  • Notable declines occurred post-AGM in August 2024, with investor disappointment following unclear monetisation plans.
  • The annual return is expected to be negative for the first time since 2014, with stock declines in September, October, November, and December.
  • Challenges include margin pressure in oil and gas, slower growth in telecom ARPU, and restructuring in retail.
"Despite its struggles, Reliance remains a critical player in the Indian market."

As the company grapples with these setbacks, its historical performance suggests potential for recovery, although future performance will depend on how it manages ongoing challenges.

item.title: LG eyes up to $15 billion valuation for India unit IPO: Report - The Economic Times
item.description:
LG Seeks Up to $15 Billion Valuation for Indian Unit IPO

Date: Not specified
Source: Bloomberg News

LG Electronics Inc. is considering a raise in the valuation of its Indian unit to $15 billion for an IPO in Mumbai next year, based on initial feedback from analysts and investors.

  • LG is targeting a listing within the first half of 2025.
  • The company previously estimated a valuation of around $13 billion.
  • The roadshow for the IPO is set to begin in the next two months.
  • LG may aim to raise between $1 billion to $1.5 billion through the IPO.
  • Key financial institutions involved include Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase.
  • LG shares have fallen about 13% this year, leading to a market value of $10 billion.
  • India's IPO market has seen significant activity this year, raising nearly $18 billion.
“Deliberations are ongoing and details could change.”

The ongoing interest in IPOs signifies a strong market performance, with multiple companies achieving substantial raises this year.

item.title: Kia Syros Teased Again Ahead Of Debut On December 19: Design, Expected Features, Powertrain, And Price - CarDekho
item.description:
Kia Syros Teased Again Ahead Of Debut On December 19

Date: December 19 | Source: CarDekho.com

The upcoming Kia Syros is set to debut in India, filling the gap between the Sonet and Seltos, featuring a boxy SUV design and advanced features.

  • The Syros will make its debut in India on December 19.
  • Flush-type door handles and a panoramic sunroof will be included.
  • Expected features: dual digital displays, ventilated seats, and 6 airbags.
  • Engine options may mirror those of the Kia Sonet.
  • Expected price starts from Rs 9 lakh (ex-showroom).
"The Syros will be the all-new SUV from the Korean automaker in India."

The Kia Syros promises a fusion of style and functionality, appealing to the compact SUV segment.

item.title: Inventurus Knowledge Solutions IPO Day 3 Live Updates: Issue booked 5.65x so far, check IKS IPO GMP, review, more | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Inventurus Knowledge Solutions IPO Day 3 Live Updates

Date & Source: 16 Dec, 2024, LiveMint

Inventurus Knowledge Solutions IPO, backed by Rekha Jhunjhunwala, opened for public subscription on December 12 and is set to close today, December 16. The IPO has a price band of ₹1,265-1,329 per share.

  • The IPO has seen a subscription rate of 7.01x so far.
  • Retail Individual Investors (RIIs) saw a subscription of 7.47x.
  • The offering raised ₹1,120 crore from anchor investors.
  • It consists solely of an Offer For Sale (OFS) of 1.88 crore equity shares.
"Inventurus Knowledge Solutions share price was trading at a premium of ₹405 in the grey market." - Investor Insight

The IPO's strong subscription rates indicate high investor interest, particularly among retail and institutional segments. The listing of shares is expected to happen on December 19, 2024.

item.title: Waaree Energies bags two projects around 398 MW to supply solar modules - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Waaree Energies Secures 398 MW Solar Module Supply Contracts

Date: December 16, 2024   |   Source: CNBC TV18

Waaree Energies Ltd. announced that it has secured two contracts totaling 398 MW for the supply of solar modules, with commencement scheduled for FY26.

  • The total capacity of the contracts is 398 MW, split between a 249 MW project and a 149 MW project.
  • The orders are from a reputable client engaged in renewable power projects within India.
  • This follows other recent awards, including a 170 MW solar power plant project in Madhya Pradesh.
  • The new initiative will help domestic testing and reduce reliance on foreign laboratories.
“This development allows the company to conduct high-quality testing domestically, saving time and resources,” - Amit Paithankar, CEO of Waaree Energies.

Waaree Energies' shares have seen significant growth this year, marking a 35.35% increase thus far.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment on December 16; Here’s how you can check status online on Kfin Technologies - The Financial Express
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment on December 16; Here’s how you can check status online on Kfin Technologies

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Financial Express

Vishal Mega Mart is set to finalize its IPO share allotment on December 16, with an oversubscription rate of 28.75 times, primarily driven by QIB investments.

  • Retail portion booked 2.43 times, NII category 15 times.
  • IPO opened for bids from December 11 and closed on December 13.
  • Investors can check allotment status via Kfin Technologies.
  • Listing expected on December 18 on NSE and BSE.
  • Minimum investment for retail: 190 shares (Rs 14,820).
  • IPO price band: Rs 74 - Rs 78 per share.
“Vishal Mega Mart, the 2nd largest offline-first diversified retailer... We recommend investors to ‘Subscribe’ to the issue,” - Motilal Oswal Financial Services.

Vishal Mega Mart's IPO is a vital opportunity for investors looking to engage with one of India's leading retail chains amidst growing consumer demand.

item.title: India's economy ends 2024 with solid momentum as business growth hits 4-month high, PMI shows - The Economic Times
item.description:
India's Economy Ends 2024 with Strong Business Growth, PMI Shows

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Economic Times

India's private sector output concluded 2024 positively, marked by a four-month high in business growth driven by robust demand in services and manufacturing, alongside record job growth.

Key highlights include:

  • Private sector output surged to the fastest pace in four months.
  • HSBC's December Composite Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) rose to 60.7, indicating strong growth.
  • Manufacturing PMI increased to 57.4, while services PMI hit a four-month high of 60.8.
  • Strong growth momentum is indicated by increased domestic orders and hiring.
  • Inflationary pressures eased with consumer inflation reported at 5.48%.
“The expansion in new domestic orders quickened, suggesting a pick-up in growth momentum in the economy.” - Ines Lam, economist at HSBC

Overall, the results paint an optimistic outlook for India’s economic growth heading into 2025, with an increased hiring pace and improved demand forecasts.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment to be finalised today: Steps to check status on BSE, NSE, KFin Tech - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment to be finalised today: Steps to check status on BSE, NSE, KFin Tech

Date: Dec 16, 2024 Source: CNBC TV18

Supermarket chain Vishal Mega Mart will finalize the allotment of its IPO today. The shares are set to debut on the BSE and NSE on December 18.

  • The IPO was open for subscription from December 11 to 13 and was subscribed 27.28 times.
  • Price band for the issue was ₹74-78 per share.
  • Qualified Institutional Buyers (QIBs) subscribed 80.75 times the reserved shares, while non-institutional investors (NIIs) subscribed 14.24 times.
  • Retail investor portion was subscribed 2.31 times.

How to check Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment status:

  1. Visit the BSE IPO allotment page, select 'Equity', choose 'Vishal Mega Mart', and enter your application number or PAN.
  2. For KFin Technologies, select 'Vishal Mega Mart', enter your PAN, application number, or DP/Client ID, then submit.

Refunds for unsuccessful bids will be initiated on December 17.

Vishal Mega Mart’s IPO details:

The company raised ₹2,400 crore from anchor investors before the IPO, which is an Offer for Sale (OFS) of equity shares worth ₹8,000 crore in total.

“Vishal Mega Mart operates 645 stores across 414 cities in India, targeting middle- and lower-middle-income groups.”

Established in 2001, Vishal Mega Mart offers a mix of private-label products and third-party brands.

item.title: IITian CEO's 'What Do You Think' question on Green Card, gets this 'one-word' answer from Elon Musk - The Times of India
item.description:
Elon Musk Responds to IITian CEO's Green Card Question

Publication Date: [Date not provided]Source: Times of India

The CEO of an IITian startup raised a question about the Green Card to Elon Musk, who succinctly responded with a single word.

  • The IITian CEO's query was about the Green Card process.
  • Elon Musk's response was reportedly just one word.
  • The interaction highlights the challenges surrounding immigration policies for tech professionals.
"One word," was Musk's simple response.

This brief exchange underscores the ongoing conversation about immigration and its impact on the tech industry.

item.title: Final Day! Yash Highvoltage IPO: Check GMP, Day 3 Subscription Status And More - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Yash Highvoltage IPO: Final Day Subscription Details and GMP

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 Source: NDTV Profit

Yash Highvoltage Ltd. has launched its initial public offering, with bidding set to close today. The grey market premium stands at Rs 100, indicating a robust interest among investors.

  • The IPO price band is set between Rs 138 to Rs 146.
  • The IPO was subscribed 48.47 times on the final day of bidding.
  • Retail investors showed significant participation, with bidding 67.38 times the reserved quota.
  • Yash Highvoltage's IPO consists of fresh issuance and an offer for sale totaling Rs 110.01 crore.
  • The company reported a revenue of Rs 27.77 crore in the first quarter of the current financial year.
The grey market premium of Yash Highvoltage IPO stood at Rs 100, signalling a 68.49% premium over the issue price.

As the IPO closes today, the successful allocation of shares will be finalized by December 17, and the listing on the BSE SME platform is expected on December 19.

item.title: Mobikwik IPO allotment expected today; Here’s how to check status, GMP online - CNBCTV18
item.description:
MobiKwik IPO Allotment Expected Today: How to Check Status and GMP Online

Published on: December 16, 2024 | Source: CNBC TV18

The allotment of shares in MobiKwik's ₹572-crore IPO is set to be finalized today, following an overwhelming response from investors.

  • The IPO was booked nearly 120 times, receiving bids for 141.72 crore shares against the 1.18 crore shares on offer.
  • Retail subscriptions accounted for 134.67 times, while qualified institutional buyers (QIBs) subscribed 119.50 times.
  • Non-institutional investors bid 35.27 crore shares against 32.37 lakh shares, resulting in an oversubscription of 108.95 times.
  • Investors can check their allotment status on the NSE and BSE websites or via the registrar, Link Intime Services Pvt Ltd.
  • Share credit into demat accounts is scheduled for December 17, and shares will be listed on December 18.
"MobiKwik is a fintech company offering prepaid digital wallets and online payment services."

With significant demand demonstrated during its IPO, MobiKwik is poised for a notable market entry, and investors are advised to stay updated on their allotment status.
